The startup crash appears to be a windows7 compatibility problem...

How to solve it: go to where you've installed the game ( C:\Program Files\Meridian4\Wasteland Angel\bin\x86\dx9 - or something similar ) and right click the Angel application... There go to compatibility and change it to windows XP service pack 3...

Worked for me.

Give up, but if there's anyone who can help I'll appreciate. Looks like a cool game and would love to give it a crack.

Cheers.

To fix the msvcr100.dll problem:

install the microsoft visual c redist.

goto: http://www.microsoft.com/download/en/details.aspx?id=5555

download and install
